titleSection.name: QASymphony qTest Integration for VersionOne
titleSection.shortDescription: Create new defects and trace defects back to executed test runs.

descriptionSection.description:
The qTest integration for VersionOne is a the only test management solution that allows you to manage your manual, exploratory, and automated testing in a single location, providing the most complete view of your testing coverage and progress on the market.

## Benefits

 * Is simple to set up â€“ get integrated in 15 minutes or less
 * Allows qTest users to submit defects directly from qTest to VersionOne
 * Retrieves requirements from VersionOne into qTest
 * Provides a full circle of traceability from VersionOne requirement -> qTest test case -> qTest test run -> VersionOne defect with links from VersionOne objects -> linked qTest objects
 * Accommodates customized fields on VersionOne requirements and defects
 * Compatible with Version One Hosted and On-Premise

commercial.shortDescription: The product is stable and supported.
